    • Constructor Detail

      • Pendu

        public Pendu(Objets recompenseJoueur,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> newMots)
        Constructor which initialize the hangman quest
        Parameters:
        recompenseJoueur - is the object that will be given to the player after the quest
        newMots - represents a array of word which are the answers to the hangman

    • Method Detail

      • executerQuete

        public java.lang.String executerQuete(Joueur joueur,
                                      Queteur queteur,
                                      java.lang.String str)
        This method allows you to run the hangman quest.
        Parameters:
        joueur - represents the player
        queteur - represents the person who give to the player the quest
        str - represents the letter that the player wrote
        Returns:
        String which can be :
        • Thank you sentence of the person who launched the quest
        • The number of the chance remaining
        • A sentence that prevents the execution of two quests (because the players have already a quest remaining)
        See Also:
        EstTropGrande, EstDansMot, devoileLettre, terminer

      • lancerQuete

        public void lancerQuete(Joueur joueur,
                        Queteur queteur)
        This method launch the quest.
        Overrides:
        lancerQuete in class Quete
        Parameters:
        joueur - the player
        queteur - the person who launch the quest

      • motJeu

        public java.lang.String motJeu()
        Getter permettant d'obtenir le mot du jeu
        Returns:
        String
